I am so thankful that we got a chance to work with Nathan through this amazing journey, because he really goes the extra mile for his clients. I have no doubt that if we should ever be in the market for a new property our first call will be to Nathan to find us that perfect home.

Julian Friedman has been an absolutely outstanding agent to work with for finding a home; as well as being a welcoming presence to the Bellingham area.

All the while, my wife and I never felt pressured to rushed into any decisions. Julian helped us to accomplish exactly what we wanted to do and landed us in a great home. We looked at a lot of homes in a few short days and we actually ended up in the first one that Julian recommended to us.

Julian and his entire team have gone above and beyond what you would expect. They are genuinely kind people and great ambassadors for the area. The team is knowledgeable of the region, know the advantages and pitfalls of each section of the city, and are a great resource for finding excellent local assistance for other aspects of moving to a new city.

I cannot recommend Julian Friedman highly enough. The team is great and Julian will guide you through the entire home buying process. You will end up in the right home for a fair (or better) price. This is a competitive market, but Julian came through for us and we couldnt be happier.

google_reviews.author: David E
google_reviews.review:
Julian Friedman is a go-getter, just the kind of agent we needed in Bellinghams tight market with a limited inventory of mid-priced condos. Because we had a limited time-frame, we wanted an agent who could aggressively help us with our search and who was well-connected in the real estate business. Julian fit both. In short order, he identified an off-market condo that was perfect for us. He lined up an inspector immediately and worked with the buyers agent to get us HOA documents quickly. When our offer was accepted, Julian identified a closer who could close in a week. He was good at explaining aspects of the transaction we didnt understand and followed up on loose ends right up to closing. It was an amazing and ultimately very satisfying experience.

Julians team is a pleasure to work with. In particular, Kailee Rose, executive assistant, has that rare quality of being both energetic and patient. Shes efficient and conscientious, and persevered in ensuring all logistical tasks were accomplished in a timely manner. Like Julian, she was good at explaining the details of the process that we didnt understand.

In short, I would highly recommend Julian and his team. They get the job done, and theyre a pleasure to work with along the way!

owner_response.text:
David,

Its wild that from the moment you walked into our office for the first time, to closing on your condo was only 8 days! It was such a joy to serve you and I look forward to staying in touch. Thanks for choosing me to help you with finding the perfect place!

google_reviews.author: Libera Geller
google_reviews.review:
Julian and his team went above and beyond for my husband and I as first-time home buyers. He was patient and understanding as we searched for the perfect home for over five years! Julian was incredibly knowledgeable about the local neighborhoods, parcel classifications, taxes, home appliances, construction quality, and all of the rules and regulations. He was also very helpful in helping us navigate the move to the area from California, and even offered to help us with things like accepting deliveries and checking in on the house after we closed to when we moved in.

In addition to his team's exceptional knowledge of the local real estate market, Julian provided us with excellent communication via text, email, and phone calls every step of the way. He was always responsive to our questions and concerns and always seemed to be going the extra mile. When we visited Bellingham, he spent an entire afternoon with my husband and me, driving us around the city, getting lunch, and just giving us the in-depth details. He was incredibly generous with his time! We were VERY picky, and I am sure very annoying at times, lol, but Julian was always so helpful.

Julian did an excellent job at negotiating on our behalf, helping us to get the best possible deal on our dream home. We closed at 16% below asking, and helped us avoid negotiation pitfalls.

He also helped us line up a loan, insurance, an inspection guy, and more. SOOOO helpful. I thought a realtors job was more straight forward, but I was totally wrong.

I would highly recommend Julian and his team to anyone looking to buy a home in the Bellingham area. They love their careers, and it shows. They exceeded our expectations in every way, and we couldn't be happier with the results. They are experts in their field and made sure that we were not just satisfied but thrilled with our home purchase experience. We also feel like we found a great friend... which is rare :)

owner_response.text:

I had a blast taking you three around and getting to know you. I'm eager to welcome you to town and help familiarize you with all of the things that I love about our wonderful community. Thanks for your kind words! It means the world to me that you took the time to express you feelings and experience in such detail.

Julian (and his cute pup) made us feel very comfortable during what was a very important moment in our lives.  My husband and I never felt hurried or rushed, and we really appreciated that.  Thankfully, the sellers agreed to a mutual contract later that same evening, and Julian was quick to call Ben and I to congratulate us, even though he was having dinner with his own family at the time.
The very next business day, Julians executive assistant, Kailee, contacted us to break down the transaction timeline.  Kailee was extremely responsive throughout the homebuying process, and her constant communications kept us on track and assured.  Kailee helped to facilitate communication with all necessary parties, including the lender, title company, inspector, and home insurers.  The home inspector that was recommended, Brad Oppedal, was very thorough and provided a detailed inspection report.  We were unable to be physically present during the inspection, but Kailee was good enough to be present in our stead and video conferenced us in with the inspector.  Kailee also did a virtual final walkthrough for us before closing to make sure everything looked in order.

While the sale is now complete, Julian has encouraged us to reach out to him and his team if we ever need anything else.  Julians services come with our highest recommendation and we are very grateful to Julian and Kailee for helping us purchase our very first home.

owner_response.text: Carl Weiseth, I am so glad you had a great experience and hope you are settling into your new neighborhood. I always look forward to connecting with my clients and hearing how things are going.  I hope your new home exceeds your expectations and please reach out any time.

google_reviews.review: We decided to move more seriously into homebuying last year and started to look for a realtor. We wanted a realtor who brought a team to the table, so we looked at realtors that advertised as one. Our thought was that it takes a village to do MOST things well nowadays; buying/selling a home is no different. We also looked at client reviews to gauge a realtors depth. We chose Julian because of his experience, local knowledge, strategy, client connection/experience, and perspective. And, he did not disappoint! His team was wonderful to work with (Kailee & Jerry), many times proving our village theory. Julian also brought local contractors and knowledge to the table when there was a question/need; he was able to get immediate feedback for us in all scenarios. He was responsive to our needs, provided insight where we had doubt, and incredibly pleasant to be around. You can tell he loves all aspects of what he does, which is important from a client perspective; I want someone who is invested in my homebuying as it is a very personal and expensive decision. End story? We just closed on the first house we put an offer in for, amazingly smooth. We are so excited about our next chapter with our new home! Thanks Julian (and team)!!

owner_response.text: Katrina, I knew from our first meeting that you and AJ would be a pleasure to work with! Im looking forward to seeing you both at our next party!!

He advised us on where to spend our money in updates and it absolutely paid off, he knows his stuff. He helped us find the right contractors and anything else we needed. Heck, he even staged our house! There are lots of realtors to choose from in Bellingham, but I truly believe youll get the best service, thats honest and personable with Julian.

google_reviews.author: Teo Crider
google_reviews.review:
I grew up in the Pacific Northwest, and have lived in Washington State for over 30 years. I arrived in Bellingham in the summer of 2010, thinking that it would be a short stop along a series of travels and new destinations, as I was an artist and a musician, often on tour. Instead, I fell in love with a city uniquely its own, making lifelong friends while exploring the surrounding wilderness and islands, and embracing the lifestyle Bellingham afforded me. I began putting down my roots.

I started searching for a home in Bellingham about 6 years ago, which in a roundabout way led me to Julian Friedman of Julian & Company, who I reached out to after having heard glowing reviews around town. Seeing as I am not an investor, not a moneyed California transplant, and not the recipient of a trust fund or inheritance, I always figured buying my first home would be one of the most stressful and daunting things I'd ever do. Working with Julian & Company was the complete opposite: they made this process so streamlined, exciting, and enjoyable.

In my initial phone call, Julian and I discussed my house needs and house wants, which helped us set a budget, timeframe, and realistic expectations. Julian got to work immediately and was able to quickly narrow down the search to a handful of promising options. During this process, he was readily available to bounce questions and ideas back and forth, and patiently answered a myriad of questions about all things housing and financing. Within a month, we looked at three dream houses, and we made one offer on a beautiful craftsman in the Sunnyland neighborhood. Our first offer beat out dozens of other potential buyers, many of them offering tens of thousands of dollars above mine, and landed me in my first home. And the house appraised over what I got it for, and I still got to have an inspection in an increasingly competitive market while securing a historically low interest rate. I have no doubt all of this is because of Julian and his team's combination of intuition, experience, hard work, and care - and it happened so quickly and effortlessly, my only regret was that I didn't approach them sooner.

All of this is to say, thanks to Julian Friedman and his team, I now own my first home, and I am thankful for all the joys, large and small, that come with it: we've since made many amazing meals in the remodeled kitchen, played badminton in the backyard, enjoyed sunsets from the deck, and had game nights and movie marathons with friends. Last spring, I planted a garden with my dad, which provided fruits and vegetables all summer. I still see Julian around town, and he always checks in and asks me how I am and how my house is coming along. Last year, Julien delivered sugar cookies to my door, and this winter, he brought me a pie for the holidays. Julian & Company, thank you all so much, sincerely. I am grateful we crossed paths, and continue to do so.

owner_response.text:
Teo,

Im blown away by this glowing review! Your creative efforts in Bellingham have been something that I have admired for years and was honored that you chose me to help you on this major life decision. Every step of the journey with you was an absolute pleasure and it brings me such joy to help facilitate you getting such a great deal and the perfect home for you to make memories in.

You are so deserving of everything good that comes to you and Im proud to call you a friend and past client! Im always here for you!

google_reviews.author: Nikki Anderson
google_reviews.review: This market is outrageous and daunting for first-time homebuyers.  Summer & Julian are the kind of people you want in markets like this:  local, knowledgeable, professional, honest & up-front, super responsive to last-minute requests, and incredibly shrewd when putting together an offer (we learned SO MUCH about that, in this process).  We started our house/land hunt in October, with broad interests in mind, and with low winter inventory available.  We lead Summer and Julian to some pretty interesting developed and undeveloped properties for many, many rainy winter months, in search of the right spot.  Summer was super quick to respond to texts and phone calls, and quickly set up showings at various properties, from Bellingham all the way down to Mount Vernon.  Her calm and cheerful demeanor, eagerness to understand what we were looking for, quick communication, and willingness to go the extra mile to get us information, made this an incredibly smooth and fun process.  When we finally decided to go for a more traditional house, she and Julian were there every step of the way, helping us to create a competitive offer and keeping the communication lines open between buyer, seller, and lender throughout.  They understand this game, they are a blast to work with, and we would love to work with them again.

owner_response.text:

Looking forward to coming to visit soon!

google_reviews.review: Julian is a fantastic realtor. As a home inspector I have worked with him on a handful of inspections and I am always impressed by his professionalism and level of care for his clients. google_reviews.author: Mike
google_reviews.review: Every now and then, someone steps into our lives without warning and enables great change!  Summer Huntington has proven to be that most recent person for my wife and me.  She came to us by referral, as we were initially trying to find a lot to have a site-built net-zero home built.  We found that such lots are difficult at best to find around Bellingham, but the owner of that construction company referred us to Summer.  The Real Estate business has a mix of companies, in terms of ethics, and we were lucky beyond measure to find Summer and her brokerage, Julian & Company!  My wife and I had a very clear vision of what we wanted for our next home, intended to be our last move.  Because of our age, we wanted a single story home, and in Whatcom County, that right away eliminates the vast majority of candidates.  We also told Summer that while we were in a 1-year lease, it would revert to month-to-month, so we asked her for patience, and patience seems to be a natural state for her!  After a number of viewings, she understood very well what we wanted, and her attitude of calm support was very much appreciated!  She assured us that our future home was out there and searching for us!  One day, it happened.  She referred us to a listing, and while there was to be an open house on the following Sunday, we reserved a private showing on that Saturday.  After we went through this house, my wife turned to Summer and said You have to get me this house!  We met with her and Julian and put together a unique offer, very advantageous to the seller, and our offer prevailed over (I believe) six others!  The fact that it was NOT the high offer illustrates how cleverly it was constructed, and while it was the first home for which we made an offer, we could not be happier with the result!  We love the home, and we appreciate how much contact we have had with Summer after the fact!  We recommend Summer Huntington and her broker, Julian & Company without qualification.  They are the BEST!!!

owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing your story, and I am over the moon about how well it worked out for you and your wife. Wow, your house literally had so many of your boxes checked and is such a beautiful home! I feel grateful to have gotten to know you both during that time, and look forward to staying in touch.
Thanks again  for making my job so enjoyable !

I lived in approximately 2 hours each way from Julian's main operating area (and  where he lives). I thought that he would just be giving me a consult but without asking for any signed agreement more then willing made the long drive to come search for houses with me. Once the day came about for us to go house searching we had 3 promising options in mind (didn't even make it to the 3rd). Once I stepped through the front doors I knew this place is for me.

That day (which was a Saturday) Julian was able to get me pre approved (my original mortgage broker dropped the ball). His contacts are incredible, communicating every step of the way with constant updates and texts throughout the entire process

Julian Friedman knows how to talk with the other team, keeping me updated on any negotiations so I am not waiting in panic, his contacts were unbelievable, setting me up with brokers and firms that had the same work ethic and pride that Julian has himself

This being my first home buying process, I can't imagine how it would have gone going with anyone else, he more then willing held my hand throughout the entire process with equal excitement for my joy of now being in my FIRST TIME PERFECT HOME

Thank you Julian Friedman, you were a life saver and will always be appreciated and definitely passed along to others.

google_reviews.author: Andrew Howard
google_reviews.review: What a great inspiration! In a time when it is difficult to find a home, Jerry Spraggins pulled through. I was at first hesitant about trying to find a place of my own. Jerry helped me through every step, especially when it came to understanding the process. It was exciting to walk through every open house and seeing the potential of my future space. I wouldn't want to use anyone else in the future. Happy hunting!

owner_response.text: As my first transaction for a close personal friend this was such a rewarding experience. We toured so many homes and I even talked you out of a few that I didn't think would work for you long term. However, you trusted me that I would find the right one and we did. I'm so happy to see your growth over the last 1/2 decade and excited to see where you go. Thanks for trusting me and our team! -Jerry

google_reviews.author: jhschmitty
google_reviews.review: Julian has always been on my side like a brother showing my potential properties. He has always been very patient and knowledgeable about the local and national market and goes above and beyond his call of duty.

owner_response.text: You are such an incredible guy and have always been someone that I deeply respect. Thank you for trusting in me to be your Realtor!

summary.text:
Good

Julian & Company has garnered a stellar reputation for their unwavering commitment to excellence. Many user reviews highlight the team's ability to secure highly competitive deals in brisk markets. Clients have praised the personalized attention and effective communication, as exemplified by one reviewer who mentioned how Julian's team guided them seamlessly through a challenging mortgage process. The constant updates and assured handling of offers have left clients feeling supported and informed throughout their real estate journeys. Numerous clients felt that Julian's profound knowledge of the Bellingham area empowered them to make informed decisions, enhancing the overall buying and selling experience under his stewardship.

Julian & Company's team is widely recognized for their adaptability and resourcefulness. A noteworthy mention is of how the team went above the typical realtor duties to ensure clients' needs were met, such as handling unexpected project changes and offering logistical support for out-of-state buyers. This attentiveness and willingness to go the extra mile, described in several user reviews, instilled confidence in clients, helping them navigate complex transactions smoothly. Julian's team not only focuses on transactional success but also on creating lasting relationships, marking them as significantly reliable in the Bellingham real estate sector.

Great

In this article, Julian & Company stands out as a remarkable entity in the realm of real estate, celebrated for their exemplary service delivery and exceptional business ethos. Clients consistently rave about how Julian and his team closed deals efficiently, often above listing prices, showcasing their adept negotiation skills. As reflected in user reviews, several clients mentioned how they achieved prices notably above expectations due to Julian's strategic approach, with particular emphasis on how homes were staged and marketed to perfection. Such outstanding results were frequent and included seamlessly handling of both buying and selling transactions.

Beyond their professional capabilities, Julian & Company are commended for cultivating a client-first approach that extends beyond standard real estate transactions. They have been described as highly personable, with Julian forming meaningful connections, making clients feel valued and heard, regardless of the circumstances. As demonstrated by reviews, their dedication to follow-up ensures clients transition into their new homes comfortably, with ongoing support for community integration. Julian's team consistently earns high praise for their enthusiastic attitudes and commitment to both client satisfaction and community involvement in the Bellingham region.

Bad

This article, upon reviewing available data, finds no explicit negative user reviews for Julian & Company. Every single review included in the dataset expresses high satisfaction, with nowhere below a perfect 5-star rating being reported. This suggests a strong pattern of consistent excellence in service and client interaction. Users have shown unwavering approval of Julian and his team, reflecting a deeply positive consensus. Despite diligent searching, no evidence suggests dissatisfaction or concerns about their real estate services from their client base. Such overwhelming positivity is rare and noteworthy in the sector.

Ugly

In keeping with the Good and Bad sections, this article reveals no ugly facets regarding Julian & Company. The firm holds a pristine record with zero reported grievances or alarming incidents in any user review. User reviews consistently repeat themes of gratitude and positive life changes facilitated by their real estate transactions. Without a single negative rating, as corroborated by the uniformly glowing feedback, no basis exists to categorize any aspect of Julian & Company's service as ugly. Their reputation stands unblemished, with each interaction seemingly fostering positive outcomes and strong relationships.
